label: Run Current File (Generic)
args: case "$ZED_FILE" in *.rb) ruby "$ZED_FILE" ;; *.py) python3 "$ZED_FILE" ;; *.js) node "$ZED_FILE" ;; *.ts) npx ts-node "$ZED_FILE" ;; *) echo "Unsupported file type: $ZED_FILE" ;; esac
